thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hansamatrix Q4 Net Profit Up At Eur 0.3 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hansamatrix Q4 Net Profit Up At Eur 0.3 Million
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - HANSAMATRIX AS:
* SAYS 12 MONTHS OF 2017 SALES VOLUME EUR 19.7 MILLION‍​ * SAYS UNAUDITED CONSOLIDATED NET TURNOVER IN Q4 REACHED EUR 5.1 MILLION , UP BY 3 PERCENT
* SAYS Q4 REPORTED EBITDA RESULT WAS EUR 0.8 MILLION UP BY 45 PERCENT
* SAYS 2017 Q4 NET PROFIT WAS EUR 0.3 MILLION EUR UP BY 139 PERCENT VERSUS Q4 2016
* SAYS 12 MONTHS OF 2017 UNAUDITED CONSOLIDATED NET TURNOVER EUR 19.7 MILLION, UP BY 16 PERCENT VERSUS LAST YEAR
* SAYS 12 MONTHS OF 2017 REPORTED EBITDA RESULT WAS EUR 3.7 MILLION , UP BY 66 PERCENT VERSUS LAST YEAR Source text : bit.ly/2HLiRdn Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
